text: Scooby Doo Spooky Coaster is an enclosed steel mouse roller coaster found at Warner Bros. Movie World. It was released as a tie-in for the 2002 movie Scooby-Doo. ==The Next Generation update (2018)== In 2018, it got an update with more visual effects and a story closer to the Spooky Island movie, complete with Scrappy-Doo as the villain. Category:2002 establishments in Australia Category:Roller coasters introduced in 2002 Category:Scooby-Doo Category:Steel roller coasters
title: Scooby-Doo Spooky Coaster
